data.title: Top 7 digital camera manufacturers
data.meta_description: Top 7 digital camera manufacturers are Sony, Canon, Samsung, Fujifilm, Panasonic, Seiko Epson, and Casio Computers.
data.text:
Photography is a passion for some people and a mode of collecting memories for others. Usually, cameras are used to capture and store memories for an extended period of time. It catches the moment with extreme quality and presents it in a unique way. Videos can also be captured in high-quality pixels and can be collected for good-time memories. The images and videos can be stored and transferred in various storages such as memory chips, mobile phones, laptops, and others. A digital camera comprises a lens, body shell, viewfinder, and LCD screen. Digital camera manufacturers have been working to increase the quality of images and videos captured by cameras.

Digital cameras can be of mainly two types: amateur and professional. Professional cameras have some unique features that are only handled by photographers and camera professionals. Digital camera manufacturers are constantly innovating digital cameras from all perspectives, such as lightweight, portable, and high-quality that can deliver seamless photography and imaging far better than smartphones. Traditional cameras that contain rolls are now replaced with digital cameras. Film processing is also easy with an inexpensive alternative, which is a digital camera. Today, digital cameras are used for various purposes, such as professional and amateur photography.

Top 7 digital camera manufacturers capturing precious moments with right angles

According to the Global Digital Camera Manufacturers Market report, the global market is anticipated to grow significantly at a faster pace owing to the rising use of digital cameras in professional and amateur help. Download a sample now for more insights.

Sony Corporation

Sony Corporation is one of the elite digital camera manufacturers operating uniquely to deliver the best camera with high-quality images and video recording. The company has been innovating its camera models with new technologies.

It was founded in 1946 by Akio Morita, and Masaru Ibuka

It is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan

Sony Group is its parent company

Canon

Canon is known for its premium-quality digital cameras that are used by consumers all around the world. The company has been a part of creating memories for people with its sophisticated imaging technology. It manufactures products such as printers, scanners, lenses, and others.

It was founded in 1937 by Takeshi Mitarai, Goro Yoshida, Takeo Maeda, and Saburo Uchida

It is located in Tokyo, Japan

Samsung Electronics

Samsung Electronics is a South Korean company and one of the leading digital camera manufacturers. Its cutting-edge technology and solutions have always attracted customers. The company creates products with a unique approach to delivering standard services.

The company was founded in 1969 by Lee Byung Chul.

It is headquartered in Suwon-SI, South Korea.

Samsung Group is its parent organization

Fujifilm Holdings

Fujifilm Holdings is an excellent name in the field of digital camera technology. The company is developing and marketing advanced camera and imaging solutions. Apart from imaging, the company is also into medical electronics, biotechnology, and chemicals.

It was founded in 1934 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation is its parent company

Its subsidiaries are FUJIFILM Business Innovation, Fujifilm Corporation

Panasonic

Panasonic has a diverse range of product portfolios for various industries. The company also offers the best digital cameras and is also known as one of the leading digital camera manufacturers. Its unique products are a result of its constant research and development.

It was founded in 1918 by Kōnosuke Matsushita

It is headquartered in Osaka, Japan

Its subsidiaries are Sanyo, Panasonic Connect Co., Ltd., Blue Yonder, and others

Seiko Epson

Seiko Epson, also known as Epson, is also one of the renowned digital camera manufacturers. It is also one of the leading manufacturers of printers, information technology-based products, and imaging-related products.

It was established in 1942 by Hisao Yamazaki

It is located in Nagano, Japan

Casio Computers

Casio Computers is known for its calculators, watches, electrical musical instruments, and digital cameras. The company utilizes best-in-class technology for imaging and videography that captures mesmerizing images and videos with right angles. The company’s manufacturing capabilities are unmatchable with innovative approaches.

It was founded in 1946 by Tadao Kashio

It is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan
